name: klipy
title: Klipy
description: Queries the Klipy gif API to search for gifs
author: keircn

commands.name: gif-search
commands.title: Search GIFs
commands.subtitle: Search Klipy for GIFs
commands.description: Search for GIFs and copy/open results quickly

commands.name: gif-trending
commands.title: Trending GIFs
commands.subtitle: Browse trending Klipy GIFs
commands.description: Browse currently trending GIFs from Klipy

commands.name: gif-suggest
commands.title: GIF Suggestions
commands.subtitle: Autocomplete and query ideas
commands.description: Get suggested GIF queries and jump to results

commands.name: gif-random
commands.title: Copy Random Trending GIF
commands.subtitle: Quickly copy or open a random GIF
commands.description: Fetch one random trending GIF and run the default action

commands.name: gif-from-selection
commands.title: GIF From Selection
commands.subtitle: Use selected text as search query
commands.description: Search Klipy with selected text and run the default action on first result

preferences.name: clientKey
preferences.title: Client Key
preferences.description: Optional client key used for analytics/ranking

preferences.name: apiBaseUrl
preferences.title: Klipy API Base URL
preferences.description: Klipy base URL. Keep default unless your account uses a custom host

preferences.name: defaultAction
preferences.title: Default Result Action
preferences.description: Action triggered first in the action panel for each GIF

preferences.name: openWithApp
preferences.title: Open GIF With App
preferences.description: Optional app used by 'Open GIF In App'

preferences.name: defaultMediaFormat
preferences.title: Preferred Media Format
preferences.description: Primary media variant to display and copy

preferences.name: contentFilter
preferences.title: Content Filter
preferences.description: Content safety level for search/trending requests

preferences.name: resultLimit
preferences.title: Result Limit
preferences.description: Maximum items loaded per API request

preferences.name: country
preferences.title: Country
preferences.description: Country code sent to Klipy (e.g. US)
